        protected void addUINode(UINeoNode node,
             boolean dropInCenterOfCamera,
             boolean moveCameraToNode)
        Parameters:
        node - node to be added
        updateModel - if true, the network model is updated. this may be false, if it is known that the network model already contains this node
        dropInCenterOfCamera - whether to drop the node in the center of the camera
        moveCameraToNode - whether to move the camera to where the node is
